requestBody.title: Invite and provision business member API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Service contract integration (parts covered)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Forgets to set buffer time between appointments". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Bulk cancellation of recurring appointments". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
